headline: Owens Corning (OC) Up 6.7% Since Last Earnings Report: Can It Continue?
summary: Owens Corning (OC) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.

headline: 2 Cash-Producing Stocks to Target This Week and 1 We Avoid
summary: Generating cash is essential for any business, but not all cash-rich companies are great investments. Some produce plenty of cash but fail to allocate it effectively, leading to missed opportunities.

raw.headline: 2 Cash-Producing Stocks to Target This Week and 1 We Avoid
raw.summary: Generating cash is essential for any business, but not all cash-rich companies are great investments. Some produce plenty of cash but fail to allocate it effectively, leading to missed opportunities.

headline: Is Masco Attractively Priced After 10% Slide Amid Housing Demand Uncertainty?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Masco is a bargain or a value trap at around $64 a share, you are not alone. This article is going to walk through what the numbers actually say. Despite being down about 10.1% year to date and 18.4% over the last year, the stock has still delivered a solid 37.0% gain over three years. This tells you sentiment around Masco can shift quickly when conditions line up. Recent moves have been shaped by shifting expectations around US housing and renovation...
